channel.title: Comments for page "Good Boy Lvl. 2"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Good Boy Lvl. 2"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: He levels when u'll FINISH bingo successfully 5 times with coup de grace jutsu and Good Bot lvl1 in your team. This CAN be NP/CdG combo, but u can do this even without note pages. I leveled Good Boy several times(=seasons) and usually 1-2 players from this 5(did 5 bingos with Season Don't Fear ending theme settled for 1 day) are note protectred so I used CdG when opponent was at 30-50 hp, anyways u should see "Good Boy watches you throw away a perfectly good ShinyShiny.." 4 times and 5th will be full level up message :)

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Does he level with note page/coup de grace combos? as in, someone uses a note page bingo AND coup at the same time?
